text: Does anyone here ever tried custom modules with smart content?

I don't believe you can use smart content in custom modules and it seems like it might be a while before it's possible: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Enable-Smart-Content-on-Rich-Text-in-Custom-Modules/idi-p/11184>

hi just wanna ask if is it possible to build something like this (<https://codepen.io/adrianjacob/pen/KdVLXY>) comparison table on HubSpot and have the text content inside the table to be editable in the landing page editor? if possible, can you direct me to something i can review?
